title: Kept: It was the only existence she knew how to live.
description: A woman in love caught up in a whirlwind romance with a man in lust, their life together a flurry of obsession, betrayal and violence shaped by each of their dark upbringings.  Drawn to the alluring and passionate demeanor of Jason Crosse, Sarah, a personal chef with a tormented past, finds herself in an unexpected yet much desired marriage. Little does Sarah realize, Jason struggles with a troubled past of his own promising to drag their lives into a damning pit of abuse, torture, and deception that will plague her life forever.
author: L.B. Plum
